author: Sarah Rankin / AP
title: Liberty University’s Jerry Falwell Jr. Under Fire for Welcoming Students Back Amid Coronavirus Pandemic
description: Officials in Lynchburg, Virginia, were fielding complaints Tuesday about the hundreds of students that have returned from their spring break to Liberty University.
content: (RICHMOND, Va.) — Officials in Lynchburg, Virginia, were fielding complaints Tuesday about the hundreds of students that have returned from their spring break to Liberty University, where President Jerry Falwell Jr. has welcomed them back amid the coronavirus… [+2020 chars]
